name: Fish Faker
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the friday night game jam: https://itch.io/jam/friday-night-game-jam-2022-41

This game was made for the Friday Night Game Jam in 3 hours. The theme of the jam was sailing COPYCAT.

I used this palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/cryptic-ocean but I did also use a small amount of white too. 

"In this game you travel around the ocean in a boat and collect fish to upgrade your boat, automate the process of collecting fish, decrease the time of collecting fish and much more. This game takes elements from idle games but i wouldn't call it an idle game."

All assets, scripts and animations were made within the 3 hour time frame that was given to me, though they were based on the appearance of my copycat target.

The game I was copying can be found here: https://bigmemerman1.itch.io/fish-fetcher
